message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $95?
I understand you're close to your target, Bob! I can meet you halfway between $95 and $110, which is $102.50. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit above $90. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?
I'm getting a bit closer to my minimum price, Bob. I can meet you at $105, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $105?
